The video was posted by an Australia: based Facebook user on June 9, 2020 and has been viewed more than 610,000 times.
At the eight: second mark of the video, a beam of light can be seen hitting the water, followed by a series of waves erupting.
The Facebook post: s caption claims that the video shows a lightning strike into a creek in Montana, warning against swimming in thunderstorms.
A reverse image search on Yandex found a: with a Finnish-language caption stating that it shows an explosion of an underwater solid rock during drilling piling work.
